shadow.name: JUDGMENT
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Work on the Decayed, expressing through judgment

gift.name: INTEGRITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Work on the Decayed, expressing through integrity

siddhi.name: PERFECTION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Work on the Decayed, expressing through perfection

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 18 shadow frequency. The judgment you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural integrity. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from judgment to integrity.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of judgment.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 18 consciously for 7 days, the judgment pattern will shift toward integrity.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 18 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from judgment toward integrity
